00019 /*
00020  * ShaderData, used in four steps:
00021  *
00022  * Setup from incoming ray, sampled position and background.
00023  * Execute for surface, volume or displacement.
00024  * Evaluate one or more closures.
00025  * Release.
00026  *
00027  */
00028 
00029 #ifdef __OSL__
00030 
00031 #include "osl_shader.h"
00032 
00033 #else
00034 
00035 #include "svm/bsdf.h"
00036 #include "svm/emissive.h"
00037 #include "svm/volume.h"
00038 #include "svm/svm_bsdf.h"
00039 #include "svm/svm.h"
00040 
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00044 
00045 /* ShaderData setup from incoming ray */
00046 
00047 __device_inline void shader_setup_from_ray(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00048     const Intersection *isect, const Ray *ray)
00049 {
00050     /* fetch triangle data */
00051     int prim = kernel_tex_fetch(__prim_index, isect->prim);
00052     float4 Ns = kernel_tex_fetch(__tri_normal, prim);
00053     float3 Ng = make_float3(Ns.x, Ns.y, Ns.z);
00054     int shader = __float_as_int(Ns.w);
00055 
00056     /* vectors */
00057     sd->P = bvh_triangle_refine(kg, isect, ray);
00058     sd->Ng = Ng;
00059     sd->N = Ng;
00060     sd->I = -ray->D;
00061     sd->shader = shader;
00062 
00063     /* triangle */
00064 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00065     sd->object = isect->object;
00066 #endif
00067     sd->prim = prim;
00068 #ifdef __UV__
00069     sd->u = isect->u;
00070     sd->v = isect->v;
00071 #endif
00072 
00073     /* smooth normal */
00074     if(sd->shader & SHADER_SMOOTH_NORMAL)
00075         sd->N = triangle_smooth_normal(kg, sd->prim, sd->u, sd->v);
00076 
00077     sd->flag = kernel_tex_fetch(__shader_flag, (sd->shader & SHADER_MASK)*2);
00078 
00079 #ifdef __DPDU__
00080     /* dPdu/dPdv */
00081     triangle_dPdudv(kg, &sd->dPdu, &sd->dPdv, sd->prim);
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00085     if(sd->object != ~0) {
00086         /* instance transform */
00087         object_normal_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->N);
00088         object_normal_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->Ng);
00089 #ifdef __DPDU__
00090         object_dir_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->dPdu);
00091         object_dir_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->dPdv);
00092 #endif
00093     }
00094     else {
00095         /* non-instanced object index */
00096         sd->object = kernel_tex_fetch(__prim_object, isect->prim);
00097     }
00098 #endif
00099 
00100     /* backfacing test */
00101     bool backfacing = (dot(sd->Ng, sd->I) < 0.0f);
00102 
00103     if(backfacing) {
00104         sd->flag |= SD_BACKFACING;
00105         sd->Ng = -sd->Ng;
00106         sd->N = -sd->N;
00107 #ifdef __DPDU__
00108         sd->dPdu = -sd->dPdu;
00109         sd->dPdv = -sd->dPdv;
00110 #endif
00111     }
00112 
00113 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00114     /* differentials */
00115     differential_transfer(&sd->dP, ray->dP, ray->D, ray->dD, sd->Ng, isect->t);
00116     differential_incoming(&sd->dI, ray->dD);
00117     differential_dudv(&sd->du, &sd->dv, sd->dPdu, sd->dPdv, sd->dP, sd->Ng);
00118 #endif
00119 }
00120 
00121 /* ShaderData setup from position sampled on mesh */
00122 
00123 __device void shader_setup_from_sample(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00124     const float3 P, const float3 Ng, const float3 I,
00125     int shader, int object, int prim,  float u, float v)
00126 {
00127     /* vectors */
00128     sd->P = P;
00129     sd->N = Ng;
00130     sd->Ng = Ng;
00131     sd->I = I;
00132     sd->shader = shader;
00133 
00134     /* primitive */
00135 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00136     sd->object = object;
00137 #endif
00138     sd->prim = prim;
00139 #ifdef __UV__
00140     sd->u = u;
00141     sd->v = v;
00142 #endif
00143 
00144     /* detect instancing, for non-instanced the object index is -object-1 */
00145 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00146     bool instanced = false;
00147 
00148     if(sd->prim != ~0) {
00149         if(sd->object >= 0)
00150             instanced = true;
00151         else
00152 #endif
00153             sd->object = ~sd->object;
00154 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00155     }
00156 #endif
00157 
00158     /* smooth normal */
00159     if(sd->shader & SHADER_SMOOTH_NORMAL) {
00160         sd->N = triangle_smooth_normal(kg, sd->prim, sd->u, sd->v);
00161 
00162 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00163         if(instanced)
00164             object_normal_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->N);
00165 #endif
00166     }
00167 
00168     sd->flag = kernel_tex_fetch(__shader_flag, (sd->shader & SHADER_MASK)*2);
00169 
00170 #ifdef __DPDU__
00171     /* dPdu/dPdv */
00172     if(sd->prim == ~0) {
00173         sd->dPdu = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00174         sd->dPdv = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00175     }
00176     else {
00177         triangle_dPdudv(kg, &sd->dPdu, &sd->dPdv, sd->prim);
00178 
00179 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00180         if(instanced) {
00181             object_dir_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->dPdu);
00182             object_dir_transform(kg, sd->object, &sd->dPdv);
00183         }
00184 #endif
00185     }
00186 #endif
00187 
00188     /* backfacing test */
00189     if(sd->prim != ~0) {
00190         bool backfacing = (dot(sd->Ng, sd->I) < 0.0f);
00191 
00192         if(backfacing) {
00193             sd->flag |= SD_BACKFACING;
00194             sd->Ng = -sd->Ng;
00195             sd->N = -sd->N;
00196 #ifdef __DPDU__
00197             sd->dPdu = -sd->dPdu;
00198             sd->dPdv = -sd->dPdv;
00199 #endif
00200         }
00201     }
00202 
00203 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00204     /* no ray differentials here yet */
00205     sd->dP.dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00206     sd->dP.dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00207     sd->dI.dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00208     sd->dI.dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00209     sd->du.dx = 0.0f;
00210     sd->du.dy = 0.0f;
00211     sd->dv.dx = 0.0f;
00212     sd->dv.dy = 0.0f;
00213 #endif
00214 }
00215 
00216 /* ShaderData setup for displacement */
00217 
00218 __device void shader_setup_from_displace(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00219     int object, int prim, float u, float v)
00220 {
00221     float3 P, Ng, I = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00222     int shader;
00223 
00224     P = triangle_point_MT(kg, prim, u, v);
00225     Ng = triangle_normal_MT(kg, prim, &shader);
00226 
00227     /* force smooth shading for displacement */
00228     shader |= SHADER_SMOOTH_NORMAL;
00229 
00230     /* watch out: no instance transform currently */
00231 
00232     shader_setup_from_sample(kg, sd, P, Ng, I, shader, object, prim, u, v);
00233 }
00234 
00235 /* ShaderData setup from ray into background */
00236 
00237 __device_inline void shader_setup_from_background(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, const Ray *ray)
00238 {
00239     /* vectors */
00240     sd->P = ray->D;
00241     sd->N = -sd->P;
00242     sd->Ng = -sd->P;
00243     sd->I = -sd->P;
00244     sd->shader = kernel_data.background.shader;
00245     sd->flag = kernel_tex_fetch(__shader_flag, (sd->shader & SHADER_MASK)*2);
00246 
00247 #ifdef __INSTANCING__
00248     sd->object = ~0;
00249 #endif
00250     sd->prim = ~0;
00251 #ifdef __UV__
00252     sd->u = 0.0f;
00253     sd->v = 0.0f;
00254 #endif
00255 
00256 #ifdef __DPDU__
00257     /* dPdu/dPdv */
00258     sd->dPdu = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00259     sd->dPdv = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00260 #endif
00261 
00262 #ifdef __RAY_DIFFERENTIALS__
00263     /* differentials */
00264     sd->dP = ray->dD;
00265     differential_incoming(&sd->dI, sd->dP);
00266     sd->du.dx = 0.0f;
00267     sd->du.dy = 0.0f;
00268     sd->dv.dx = 0.0f;
00269     sd->dv.dy = 0.0f;
00270 #endif
00271 }
00272 
00273 /* BSDF */
00274 
00275 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00276 
00277 __device_inline void _shader_bsdf_multi_eval(const ShaderData *sd, const float3 omega_in, float *pdf,
00278     int skip_bsdf, BsdfEval *bsdf_eval, float sum_pdf, float sum_sample_weight)
00279 {
00280     for(int i = 0; i< sd->num_closure; i++) {
00281         if(i == skip_bsdf)
00282             continue;
00283 
00284         const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00285 
00286         if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF(sc->type)) {
00287             float bsdf_pdf = 0.0f;
00288 #ifdef __OSL__
00289             float3 eval = OSLShader::bsdf_eval(sd, sc, omega_in, bsdf_pdf);
00290 #else
00291             float3 eval = svm_bsdf_eval(sd, sc, omega_in, &bsdf_pdf);
00292 #endif
00293 
00294             if(bsdf_pdf != 0.0f) {
00295                 bsdf_eval_accum(bsdf_eval, sc->type, eval*sc->weight);
00296                 sum_pdf += bsdf_pdf*sc->sample_weight;
00297             }
00298 
00299             sum_sample_weight += sc->sample_weight;
00300         }
00301     }
00302 
00303     *pdf = (sum_sample_weight > 0.0f)? sum_pdf/sum_sample_weight: 0.0f;
00304 }
00305 
00306 #endif
00307 
00308 __device void shader_bsdf_eval(KernelGlobals *kg, const ShaderData *sd,
00309     const float3 omega_in, BsdfEval *eval, float *pdf)
00310 {
00311 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00312     bsdf_eval_init(eval, NBUILTIN_CLOSURES, make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f), kernel_data.film.use_light_pass);
00313 
00314     return _shader_bsdf_multi_eval(sd, omega_in, pdf, -1, eval, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00315 #else
00316     const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure;
00317 
00318     *pdf = 0.0f;
00319     *eval = svm_bsdf_eval(sd, sc, omega_in, pdf)*sc->weight;
00320 #endif
00321 }
00322 
00323 __device int shader_bsdf_sample(KernelGlobals *kg, const ShaderData *sd,
00324     float randu, float randv, BsdfEval *bsdf_eval,
00325     float3 *omega_in, differential3 *domega_in, float *pdf)
00326 {
00327 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00328     int sampled = 0;
00329 
00330     if(sd->num_closure > 1) {
00331         /* pick a BSDF closure based on sample weights */
00332         float sum = 0.0f;
00333 
00334         for(sampled = 0; sampled < sd->num_closure; sampled++) {
00335             const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[sampled];
00336             
00337             if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF(sc->type))
00338                 sum += sc->sample_weight;
00339         }
00340 
00341         float r = sd->randb_closure*sum;
00342         sum = 0.0f;
00343 
00344         for(sampled = 0; sampled < sd->num_closure; sampled++) {
00345             const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[sampled];
00346             
00347             if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF(sc->type)) {
00348                 sum += sd->closure[sampled].sample_weight;
00349 
00350                 if(r <= sum)
00351                     break;
00352             }
00353         }
00354 
00355         if(sampled == sd->num_closure) {
00356             *pdf = 0.0f;
00357             return LABEL_NONE;
00358         }
00359     }
00360 
00361     const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[sampled];
00362     int label;
00363     float3 eval;
00364 
00365     *pdf = 0.0f;
00366 #ifdef __OSL__
00367     label = OSLShader::bsdf_sample(sd, sc, randu, randv, eval, *omega_in, *domega_in, *pdf);
00368 #else
00369     label = svm_bsdf_sample(sd, sc, randu, randv, &eval, omega_in, domega_in, pdf);
00370 #endif
00371     if(*pdf != 0.0f) {
00372         bsdf_eval_init(bsdf_eval, sc->type, eval*sc->weight, kernel_data.film.use_light_pass);
00373 
00374         if(sd->num_closure > 1) {
00375             float sweight = sc->sample_weight;
00376             _shader_bsdf_multi_eval(sd, *omega_in, pdf, sampled, bsdf_eval, *pdf*sweight, sweight);
00377         }
00378     }
00379 
00380     return label;
00381 #else
00382     /* sample the single closure that we picked */
00383     *pdf = 0.0f;
00384     int label = svm_bsdf_sample(sd, &sd->closure, randu, randv, bsdf_eval, omega_in, domega_in, pdf);
00385     *bsdf_eval *= sd->closure.weight;
00386     return label;
00387 #endif
00388 }
00389 
00390 __device void shader_bsdf_blur(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float roughness)
00391 {
00392 #ifndef __OSL__
00393 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00394     for(int i = 0; i< sd->num_closure; i++) {
00395         ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00396 
00397         if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF(sc->type))
00398             svm_bsdf_blur(sc, roughness);
00399     }
00400 #else
00401     svm_bsdf_blur(&sd->closure, roughness);
00402 #endif
00403 #endif
00404 }
00405 
00406 __device float3 shader_bsdf_transparency(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00407 {
00408 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00409     float3 eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00410 
00411     for(int i = 0; i< sd->num_closure; i++) {
00412         ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00413 
00414         if(sc->type == CLOSURE_BSDF_TRANSPARENT_ID) // todo: make this work for osl
00415             eval += sc->weight;
00416     }
00417 
00418     return eval;
00419 #else
00420     if(sd->closure.type == CLOSURE_BSDF_TRANSPARENT_ID)
00421         return sd->closure.weight;
00422     else
00423         return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00424 #endif
00425 }
00426 
00427 __device float3 shader_bsdf_diffuse(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00428 {

00433         ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00434 
00435         if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF_DIFFUSE(sc->type))
00436             eval += sc->weight;
00437     }
00438 
00439     return eval;
00440 #else
00441     if(CLOSURE_IS_BSDF_DIFFUSE(sd->closure.type))
00442         return sd->closure.weight;
00443     else
00444         return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00445 #endif
00446 }

00490 /* Emission */
00491 
00492 __device float3 shader_emissive_eval(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00493 {
00494     float3 eval;
00495 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00496     eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00497 
00498     for(int i = 0; i < sd->num_closure; i++) {
00499         ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00500 
00501         if(CLOSURE_IS_EMISSION(sc->type)) {
00502 #ifdef __OSL__
00503             eval += OSLShader::emissive_eval(sd)*sc->weight;
00504 #else
00505             eval += svm_emissive_eval(sd, sc)*sc->weight;
00506 #endif
00507         }
00508     }
00509 #else
00510     eval = svm_emissive_eval(sd, &sd->closure)*sd->closure.weight;
00511 #endif
00512 
00513     return eval;
00514 }
00515 
00516 /* Holdout */
00517 
00518 __device float3 shader_holdout_eval(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00519 {
00520 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00521     float3 weight = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00522 
00523     for(int i = 0; i < sd->num_closure; i++) {
00524         ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00525 
00526         if(CLOSURE_IS_HOLDOUT(sc->type))
00527             weight += sc->weight;
00528     }
00529 
00530     return weight;
00531 #else
00532     if(sd->closure.type == CLOSURE_HOLDOUT_ID)
00533         return make_float3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00534 
00535     return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00536 #endif
00537 }
00538 
00539 /* Surface Evaluation */
00540 
00541 __device void shader_eval_surface(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00542     float randb, int path_flag)
00543 {
00544 #ifdef __OSL__
00545     OSLShader::eval_surface(kg, sd, randb, path_flag);
00546 #else
00547 
00548 #ifdef __SVM__
00549     svm_eval_nodes(kg, sd, SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE, randb, path_flag);
00550 #else
00551     bsdf_diffuse_setup(sd, &sd->closure);
00552     sd->closure.weight = make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00553 #endif
00554 
00555 #endif
00556 }
00557 
00558 /* Background Evaluation */
00559 
00560 __device float3 shader_eval_background(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, int path_flag)
00561 {
00562 #ifdef __OSL__
00563     return OSLShader::eval_background(kg, sd, path_flag);
00564 #else
00565 
00566 #ifdef __SVM__
00567     svm_eval_nodes(kg, sd, SHADER_TYPE_SURFACE, 0.0f, path_flag);
00568 
00569 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00570     float3 eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00571 
00572     for(int i = 0; i< sd->num_closure; i++) {
00573         const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00574 
00575         if(CLOSURE_IS_BACKGROUND(sc->type))
00576             eval += sc->weight;
00577     }
00578 
00579     return eval;
00580 #else
00581     if(sd->closure.type == CLOSURE_BACKGROUND_ID)
00582         return sd->closure.weight;
00583     else
00584         return make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00585 #endif
00586 
00587 #else
00588     return make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00589 #endif
00590 
00591 #endif
00592 }
00593 
00594 /* Volume */
00595 
00596 __device float3 shader_volume_eval_phase(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00597     float3 omega_in, float3 omega_out)
00598 {
00599 #ifdef __MULTI_CLOSURE__
00600     float3 eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00601 
00602     for(int i = 0; i< sd->num_closure; i++) {
00603         const ShaderClosure *sc = &sd->closure[i];
00604 
00605         if(CLOSURE_IS_VOLUME(sc->type)) {
00606 #ifdef __OSL__
00607             eval += OSLShader::volume_eval_phase(sd, omega_in, omega_out);
00608 #else
00609             eval += volume_eval_phase(sd, sc, omega_in, omega_out);
00610 #endif
00611         }
00612     }
00613 
00614     return eval;
00615 #else
00616     return volume_eval_phase(sd, &sd->closure, omega_in, omega_out);
00617 #endif
00618 }
00619 
00620 /* Volume Evaluation */
00621 
00622 __device void shader_eval_volume(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd,
00623     float randb, int path_flag)
00624 {
00625 #ifdef __SVM__
00626 #ifdef __OSL__
00627     OSLShader::eval_volume(kg, sd, randb, path_flag);
00628 #else
00629     svm_eval_nodes(kg, sd, SHADER_TYPE_VOLUME, randb, path_flag);
00630 #endif
00631 #endif
00632 }
00633 
00634 /* Displacement Evaluation */
00635 
00636 __device void shader_eval_displacement(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00637 {
00638     /* this will modify sd->P */
00639 #ifdef __SVM__
00640 #ifdef __OSL__
00641     OSLShader::eval_displacement(kg, sd);
00642 #else
00643     svm_eval_nodes(kg, sd, SHADER_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT, 0.0f, 0);
00644 #endif
00645 #endif
00646 }
00647 
00648 /* Transparent Shadows */
00649 
00650 #ifdef __TRANSPARENT_SHADOWS__
00651 __device bool shader_transparent_shadow(KernelGlobals *kg, Intersection *isect)
00652 {
00653     int prim = kernel_tex_fetch(__prim_index, isect->prim);
00654     float4 Ns = kernel_tex_fetch(__tri_normal, prim);
00655     int shader = __float_as_int(Ns.w);
00656     int flag = kernel_tex_fetch(__shader_flag, (shader & SHADER_MASK)*2);
00657 
00658     return (flag & SD_HAS_SURFACE_TRANSPARENT) != 0;
00659 }
00660 #endif
00661 
00662 __device int shader_pass_id(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00663 {
00664     return kernel_tex_fetch(__shader_flag, (sd->shader & SHADER_MASK)*2 + 1);
00665 }
00666 
00667 /* Free ShaderData */
00668 
00669 __device void shader_release(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd)
00670 {
00671 #ifdef __OSL__
00672     OSLShader::release(kg, sd);
00673 #endif
00674 }
